title: Growth Marketing Playbook
description: A comprehensive 35-page guide to developing and executing a data-driven growth marketing strategy that consistently delivers results.
content:
This comprehensive playbook is designed to help B2B marketers implement a systematic approach to growth marketing that delivers measurable results. Inside, you'll find actionable frameworks, templates, and step-by-step instructions covering:

Customer Acquisition Framework

Learn how to identify your ideal customer profiles, map their journey, and create targeted acquisition strategies for each stage of the funnel.

Channel Selection Matrix

Discover which marketing channels are most effective for your specific business model, industry, and growth stage with our proprietary channel evaluation framework.

ROI Measurement Templates

Implement proven systems to track marketing performance, attribute revenue to specific channels, and continuously optimize your marketing spend.

title: B2B Content Strategy Template
description: The exact content planning framework I use with clients to create content that converts prospects at every stage of the buyer journey.
content:
This template pack gives you everything you need to develop a content marketing strategy that generates qualified leads and nurtures them through your sales process. Inside, you'll find:

Funnel-Aligned Content Maps

Plan content that addresses specific buyer questions and objections at each stage of the decision-making process, from awareness to consideration to decision.

Topic Research Worksheet

Identify high-value content topics that balance search volume, relevance to your audience, and competitive opportunity.

Content Performance Metrics

Track the right KPIs for each piece of content based on its funnel position and strategic objective.

title: Employer Branding Toolkit
description: Everything you need to build an authentic employer brand that attracts top talent and reduces recruitment costs by up to 50%.
content:
This comprehensive toolkit helps HR and marketing leaders collaborate to build a powerful employer brand that attracts ideal candidates and reduces hiring costs. Inside, you'll find:

EVP Development Blueprint

Develop a compelling Employee Value Proposition that authentically communicates why top talent should join and stay with your company.

Candidate Persona Template

Create detailed personas for your ideal candidates, including their career motivations, information sources, and decision criteria.

Employer Brand Audit Tools

Assess your current employer brand strength and identify the highest-impact opportunities for improvement across all candidate touchpoints.

title: Marketing Budget Optimizer
description: An interactive spreadsheet tool that helps optimize your marketing budget allocation based on historical performance and business goals.
content:
This interactive Excel tool takes the guesswork out of marketing budget allocation, helping you make data-driven decisions that maximize returns. Inside, you'll find:

Budget Allocation Model

Input your total marketing budget and let our algorithm recommend optimal allocation across channels based on your goals and historical performance data.

ROI Comparison Calculator

Compare the projected returns from different budget scenarios to make informed decisions about where to increase or decrease spending.

Channel Performance Tracker

Monitor actual performance against projections and automatically adjust future recommendations based on real-world results.

title: B2B Sales Enablement Kit
description: Empower your sales team with the tools they need to effectively communicate your value proposition and close more deals.
content:
Bridge the gap between marketing and sales with this comprehensive kit designed to equip your sales team with everything they need to convert leads into customers. Inside, you'll find:

Objection Handling Playbook

Prepare your sales team with proven responses to the most common objections they'll face during the sales process.

Competitive Battlecards

Equip your team with detailed comparisons between your solution and competitors, highlighting your unique advantages for different buyer scenarios.

Value Proposition Scripts

Provide ready-to-use messaging that clearly communicates your value to different buyer personas and industries.

title: Marketing Analytics Dashboard
description: A customizable dashboard template that helps you track and visualize your key marketing metrics in one centralized location.
content:
Stop cobbling together reports from multiple platforms and start making decisions based on a unified view of your marketing performance. This Excel-based dashboard template includes:

KPI Visualization Templates

Instantly see how you're performing against key metrics with pre-built charts and graphs that make trends and patterns easy to spot.

Multi-Channel Tracking

Consolidate data from paid advertising, organic social, email, content marketing, and more into a single cohesive view.

Executive Reporting Views

Generate presentation-ready reports that highlight the metrics that matter most to leadership, with clear ROI calculations and business impact assessments.
